mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Major Clive Kirkpatrick Daly, British Political Agent at Bahrain, and Captain B Stuart Horner, Secretary to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire. The correspondence concerns the exchange of land between the British Agency and the Bahrain Government, and the possible necessity to amend title-deeds.
